name: Jekyll and Hide
description:
Play as a mad scientist.

Sneaking through a top secret Laboratory to find the antidote. you transform into a murderous psycho every 10 seconds. Can you finally put your mind to rest?

🔪🔪🔪

Move with the Arrow keys Press R to restart a level F4 for fullscreen ESC to quit

🔪🔪🔪

Can you beat all 15 levels and find the true cure?

👽👽👽

Everything was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare.

Made by Gangru Music, pixel art, code, etc made by Gangru of course. Thanks for playing I hope you enjoy!
